mapper.select: select b2.id, b2.fxjldh, b2.fjzch, to_char(b2.fxrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') fxrq, b1.hc, (select (sum(t1.fxsj_xs) + (CASE WHEN b3.init_fxsj_xs IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE b3.init_fxsj_xs END)) || ':' || (sum(t1.fxsj_fz) + (CASE WHEN b3.init_fxsj_fz IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE b3.init_fxsj_fz END)) fxsj from b_s_00601 t1 join b_s_006 t2 on t2.id = t1.fxjldid and t2.zt in (2, 12, 99) and t1.zt = 1 and t1.xdbs = 0 where ((t2.fxrq < b2.fxrq) or (t2.fxrq = b2.fxrq and t2.zdsj < b2.zdsj) or (t2.fxrq = b2.fxrq and t2.zdsj = b2.zdsj and t1.hc <= b1.hc)) and t2.fjzch = b2.fjzch and t2.dprtcode = b2.dprtcode) fxsj, b1.mgb, b1.igb, b1.tgb, b1.jh_f1, b1.xlh_f1, b1.f1_hy, b1.f1_wdyd, b1.f1_glyd, b1.jh_f2, b1.xlh_f2, b1.f2_hy, b1.f2_wdyd, b1.f2_glyd from b_s_00601 b1 join b_s_006 b2 on b1.fxjldid = b2.id and b2.zt in (2, 12, 99) and b1.zt = 1 and b1.xdbs = 0 and b2.fxrq >= to_date(#{dateBegin, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b2.fxrq <= to_date(#{dateEnd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b2.fjzch = #{fjzch, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b2.dprtcode = #{dprtcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} left join (select t.fjzch,t.dprtcode, CASE WHEN INSTR(t.init_value, ':') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(t.init_value, 0, INSTR(t.init_value, ':') - 1) WHEN INSTR(t.init_value, '.') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(t.init_value, 0, INSTR(t.init_value, '.') - 1) ELSE t.init_value END init_fxsj_xs, CASE WHEN INSTR(t.init_value, ':') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(t.init_value, INSTR(t.init_value, ':') + 1) WHEN INSTR(t.init_value, '.') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(t.init_value, INSTR(t.init_value, '.') + 1) ELSE NULL END init_fxsj_fz from d_00701 t where t.init_xmbh = 'init_time_jsfx') b3 on b3.fjzch = b2.fjzch and b3.dprtcode = b2.dprtcode order by b2.fxrq asc,b2.zdsj asc, b1.hc asc
